document_data.name: Hark
document_data.mainbody: '''Hark''' was the leader of a group of [[goblin]]s sometime after the [[War of the Silver Marches]].
document_data.History:
Hark and his fellow goblins lived in the [[Ardeep Forest]]. In the late 1480s or early 1490s [[DR]] the [[elves]] managed to expel them from the forest.

Hark relocated the goblins to a cave near the [[Nightstone]] village. Thanks to the [[cloud giant]]s' bombardment, Hark managed to capture the fleeing villagers.
document_data.Personality: Hark was a reasonable person. He always preferred to bargain than fight.
